version_description:
- UI Improvement
- Add new musics
- Fix some bugs
- iPad Adaptive
- Fix iOS8 exporting crash

- New photo editor
- New video zoom animation（video settings > video zoom animation）
- UI Improvement
- Fix some bugs

- Add new stickers
- Fixs some bugs

fix problem 'some video frame picks always failed'
fix problem 'share to some app always using first creative video'

- Add sticker entrance animations
- Add new stickers
- Stability Improvement

• Preview video in real time without waiting.
• Redesign music module, you can customize music now.
• Optimize sharing, autosave to camera roll by default.
• Increase video length to 20s
• Fix bugs, Stability improvement

• Add new wasted style video editor
• User interface improvement
• Fix some bugs

• Fix "Can not select app musics"

• Add new shadows video effects, you can create multiple yourself shadows in video
• User interface improvement and bug fixes

• New Ascii Pic Photo and Video Editor (Only Pro User)
• Fix some bugs and user interface improvement
• Fix some bugs and compatible with iOS12
